main event: On January 10, 1965, a man and his family observed a large, glowing object with blinking lights that hovered and then ascended vertically at a rapid rate of speed.
interesting points: The object was round with a metallic-like hull or surface and was brilliantly lit from within.
The object had blinking lights around the outer edge that changed color from red to green to orange.
The object made no sound whatsoever.
The object hovered for approximately 8 minutes before ascending vertically.

On January 30, 1964, Mr. and Mrs. Johnson saw a cigar-shaped object hovering over a field that was dull metallic in color and gave off a reddish glow. It hovered for a few minutes then moved away at a high rate of speed.
sighted object: a large, glowing, round object with blinking lights and a cigar-shaped object
witnesses: a man and his family, Mr. and Mrs. Johnson
